tweet.text: 🎶Dissertation deadlines are frightful But #FRUS search is so delightful And with dates I now cavort Let me sort, let me sort, let me sort! Combine keywords, date ranges, and volume-based filtering in our new search interface: https://t.co/1ECc9ulUnu
tweet.html: 🎶Dissertation deadlines are frightful But #FRUS search is so delightful And with dates I now cavort Let me sort, let me sort, let me sort! Combine keywords, date ranges, and volume-based filtering in our new search interface: history.state.gov/search
